title: ASOIAF Miniatures Game Season 4 Update: The Goonhammer Hot Take
description: We talk about CMON's bombshell reveal of the Season 4 update and what it likely means for the game.

title: Goonhammer Review: Bandua Aldan Terrain bundles
description: Soggy checks out two different terrain bundles from Bandua Wargaming for Warhammer 40K/Horus Heresy

title: How to Paint Everything: Shatterpoint We Are Brave
description: Shatterpoint has some fabulous miniatures, but there are a few that people can find very intimidating to tackle, and the box that has been mentioned again and again in this light is We Are Brave. From the transitions on the handmaiden’s outfits to the gems on Padme’s gown, there are some real technical challenges to […]

title: Competitive Innovations in the Mortal Realms: The Battle for Las Vegas
description: It’s time for the event. Like, The Event. The Las Vegas Open is the biggest event for Sigmar, arguably in the entire world. The end of the ITC season and the biggest attendance you will see, it’s a great way to see many different armies and make your grab for the top. Many of the best […]

title: Competitive Innovations in 10th: Boxed Out pt.1 – The LVO
description: A bit of a mixup to our usual formula this week – with the biggest event of the year (the LVO) happening the weekend just past, we wanted to give it the attention it deserves, with coverage of the full top eight from both of us. That means that today we’ll be looking at: The Las […]
